membership.check_auth_membership_failed_1: we cannot verify your membership from YouTube API.
membership.check_auth_membership_failed_2: Please go to our [website](https://divine-bridge.jerrycool123.com) to verify your YouTube membership again.

You might need to notify them yourself.

I will try to remove the role from the members, but if I failed to do so, please remove the role manually.
If you believe this is an error, please contact the bot owner to resolve this issue.

add_member_command.name: add-member
add_member_command.description: Manually assign a YouTube membership role to a member in this server
add_member_command.member_option_description: The member to assign the role to
add_member_command.role_option_description: The YouTube Membership role in this server
add_member_command.end_date_option_description: The end date of the granted membership in YYYY-MM-DD, default to tomorrow

add_role_command.name: add-role
add_role_command.description: Add a YouTube membership role in this server
add_role_command.role_option_description: The YouTube Membership role in this server
add_role_command.keyword_option_description: The YouTube channel's ID (UCXXXX...), name or custom URL (@xxx...)
add_role_command.alias_option_description: The alias of the `/verify` command for this membership role

add_youtube_channel_command.name: add-youtube-channel
add_youtube_channel_command.description: Add a YouTube channel to the bot's supported list
add_youtube_channel_command.id_option_description: YouTube channel ID (UCXXXX...) or video ID

check_member_command.name: check-member
check_member_command.description: Check a member's membership status in this server
check_member_command.member_option_description: The member to check the membership status for

delete_member_command.name: delete-member
delete_member_command.description: Manually remove a YouTube membership role from a member in this server
delete_member_command.member_option_description: The member to remove the role from
delete_member_command.role_option_description: The YouTube Membership role in this server

delete_role_command.name: delete-role
delete_role_command.description: Delete a YouTube membership role in this server
delete_role_command.role_option_description: The YouTube Membership role in this server

ping_command.name: ping
ping_command.description: Ping bot to see the latency

set_log_channel_command.name: set-log-channel
set_log_channel_command.description: Set a log channel where the membership verification requests would be sent
set_log_channel_command.channel_option_description: The log channel in this server

verify_command.description_1: Provide a screenshot and verify your

verify_command.language_option_description: The language of the text in your picture
verify_command.name: verify

view_members_command.name: view-members
view_members_command.description: View all members with a specific membership role in this server

set_language_command.name: set-language
